schemes.name: ODOP - One District One Product
schemes.objective: Promote traditional crafts and products unique to each district, creating sustainable livelihoods for artisans.
schemes.minglemakersAlignment: Direct district-to-cluster mapping enables artisans to showcase region-specific crafts and connect with buyers nationwide.

schemes.name: SFURTI - Fund for Regeneration of Traditional Industries
schemes.nameHindi: पारंपरिक उद्योगों के पुनर्जनन के लिए कोष
schemes.objective: Organize traditional industries into clusters to improve competitiveness and create sustainable employment.
schemes.minglemakersAlignment: Platform facilitates cluster formation, supplier matchmaking, and capacity building for traditional artisan groups.

schemes.name: AHVY - Ambedkar Hastshilp Vikas Yojana
schemes.objective: Provide financial assistance and skill development to marginalized artisan communities for handicraft production.
schemes.minglemakersAlignment: Targeted support for underserved artisan communities through material access, storytelling tools, and market linkages.

schemes.name: Make in India / Vocal for Local
schemes.nameHindi: मेक इन इंडिया / स्थानीय के लिए मुखर
schemes.objective: Promote indigenous manufacturing, handicrafts, and local products to boost the Indian economy.
schemes.minglemakersAlignment: Direct artisan-to-consumer pathways reduce middlemen, showcasing 'Made in India' crafts globally with authentic storytelling.

schemes.name: Digital India / e-Commerce Policy
schemes.objective: Empower citizens through digital literacy, infrastructure, and e-governance to enable inclusive growth.
schemes.minglemakersAlignment: Low-literacy-friendly interface, multilingual support, and digital onboarding tools bring artisans online seamlessly.

digitalInclusion.label: Digital Inclusion
digitalInclusion.description: Artisans successfully onboarded to digital platforms

circularEconomy.label: Circular Economy
circularEconomy.description: Materials sourced from recycled or sustainable sources
